Patients randomize 1 3 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive bevacizumab IV 30-90 minute every 2 week . - Arm II : Patients receive bevacizumab arm I low-dose recombinant interferon alpha-2a subcutaneously ( SC ) 3 time weekly begin day 0 . - Arm III : Patients receive bevacizumab arm I standard-dose recombinant interferon alpha-2a SC 3 time weekly begin day 0 . After 8 week treatment , recombinant interferon alpha-2a dosage may modify discontinue discretion investigator . Treatment continue absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity .
